snippet: Stephen Elliott, Dave Eggers and Mary Robinette Kowal are among the authors looking to revive the art of writing letters.
abstract: Stephen Elliott, Dave Eggers and Mary Robinette Kowal are among the authors looking to revive the art of writing letters.
lead_paragraph: In potentially good news for the ailing United States Postal Service, 2012 is turning into a year of grassroots letter-writing campaigns, like the directly named Facebook group "Save the U.S. Postal Service by Writing More Letters." But at least two schemes to revive the epistolary art have been hatched by accomplished authors.

headline.main: Notable Authors Give Snail Mail a Boost
